## How to Register

### Step 1: Fill the registration form

Click the button below to access the registration form:
<!-- Sostituisci con il tuo link Google Forms -->
[Registration Form](https://forms.google.com/your-form-link){.btn .btn-primary .btn-lg}

### Step 2: Payment

After submitting the form, you will receive an email with payment instructions.

**Payment methods accepted:**

- Bank transfer
- Credit card (via PayPal)

**Bank details:**

```
Bank: [Bank Name]
Account holder: [Name]
IBAN: [IBAN number]
BIC/SWIFT: [Code]
Reference: CONF2025 - [Your Surname]
```

### Step 3: Confirmation

Once payment is received, you will receive a confirmation email with your registration number.
